title: SOLD: T206 Cobb Red (name on top as well)
author: gnaz01

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Cobb Red (name on top as well)
posts.post_content:
Bought this from an awesome board member and was planning on doing a project with an autographed letter I have as well but going to do something totally different now.  

Cobb's name appears in the normal spot but also his name is at the top as well (albeit about 1/2 way cut off but still VERY readable). No creases!!

Asking $1100/OBO delivered (EXACTLY WHAT I PAID), PP FF, cash. check, MO all OK.

Thanks,
Greg
